channel.title: [Help] Server Commands [Help]
channel.description:
Sorry if this is wrong server, Please move it if it is
And don't lock please.
Well I'm not sure how to make Commands for example ::Example Stuff like that, If you could help me i'd love that :) Thanks guys, Thanks for taking the time and reading this and helping :P

item.title: [Help] Server Commands [Help]
item.dc:creator: @MisterZ MisterZ
item.description:
@MisterZ wrote:

Or my favorite code that I made which turns people into npcs.

if (command.startsWith("morph")) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6,10)); String otherPName = command.substring(11); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.npcId = newNPC; p.isNpc = true; p.updateRequired = true; p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; p.sendMessage("A magic spell changed you!"); p.stillgfx(398, absY, absX); } else { sendMessage("That name doesn't exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::morph #### playerName"); } }

type ::morph #### [PLAYERNAME] . For #### type the npc ID. It’s used like the ::pickup code you must type 0’s even if it’s a single number. Example ::morph 0001 MisterZ . I just turned myself into man. It’s not ::pnpc because you can do it to other players.

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] Server Commands [Help]
item.dc:creator: @Fenam Fenam
item.description:
@Fenam wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“pring”) && playerRights >= 0) {
addItem(773, 1);
sendMessage(“HERE YOU GO dumbass.”);

}

You missed a quotation.

I think you have to have it for the commands to work.

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] Server Commands [Help]
item.dc:creator: @mod_robby mod robby
item.description:
@mod_robby wrote:

Its very simple really,
Well since i don’t know what kinda of command you want i’ll teach you how to do a add item command.

Open and client.java

So search:

("master")

Something like this should come up:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2)
         {
   addSkillXP(486000000, 0); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 1); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 2); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 3); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 4); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 5); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 6); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 7); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 8); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 9); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 10); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 11);
   addSkillXP(486000000, 12); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 13); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 14); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 15); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 16); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 17); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 18); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 19); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 20);
   addSummonXP(886000000); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 21); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 22);
   addSkillXP(486000000, 23); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 24);
   sendMessage("YOU B MAXED OUT LIKE A BITCH!!! (go own some noobs)."); 
}

Under the last } hit enter

put this:

if (command.startsWith("COMMAND HERE) && playerRights >= 0) {
     addItem(ITEM ID HERE, HOW MUCH YOU GET); 
 
}

Put Where COMMAND HERE and such and replace it with what fits you.

You could make it say a message when you type it too
example:

if (command.startsWith("pring) && playerRights >= 0) {
     addItem(773, 1); 
   sendMessage("HERE YOU GO dumbass."); 
 
}

Your welcome

Read full topic
